## NoUsableFiles class

Error thrown when [`StoresClient.replaceFiles()`](./hub.storesclient.replacefiles.md) fails because the request didn't contain any usable files.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class NoUsableFiles extends NotOK 
```
**Extends:** [NotOK](./core.notok.md)

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `NoUsableFiles` class.
